item.title: Cleaning issue, 5th February
item.description:
Pavement on Woolwich Hight street towards woolwich ferry bus stop did not see a cleaning since autumn.Lots of glas,cans,rubbish mixed wirh leaves created danger when its raining due to pavement becoming slippery.Issue needs urgent fixing before someone slips and breaks a leg

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Maud Cashmore Way, Woolwich
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Numerous potholes, 5th February

item.title: Litter picker, 5th February
item.description:
Yesterday I spotted a litter picker ,(rare sight in this part of Bromley) He was picking rubbish up near the flats, on finishing that, he proceeded to walk down towards Salisbury Road junction looking at his phone and did not pick up any of the detritus , that was in the gutter or on the pavement, this street has not been cleaned for 12 weeks because of gas works , this end of Crown Lane had traffic lights so consequently there is rubbish in the gutters. Obviously what was on his phone was far more important than his job.Also the Green could do with detritus being removed .
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Crown Lane, Southborough, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Lancey Close, Charlton
